timeline.message:
move extension array example up one level in the tree

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>

timeline.author: albertwang-ibm

replies.bodyText:
no, I think github was just hiding the lines in the middle on you.  be sure to expand the
 to see the full context
replies.author: lmsurpre

timeline.author: albertwang-ibm

timeline.message:
move required fields down one level in the hierarchy

This makes the object definitions slightly more composable and also
works a little better in Rational Software Architect.

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: So, looks like these following lines are the key of the fix. the old codes didn't really add the example. correct?
timeline.author: albertwang-ibm

replies.bodyText: not quite; the old code added the examples at the property level (lines 1276 and 1282 respectively).  now that we're adding the examples one level up, i actually meant to remove those lines...so thanks for the reminder!
replies.author: lmsurpre

timeline.message:
Remove extension and indentifier examples from the inner level

I meant to move them to the outer level before, but I accidentally just
added them a second time...this commit fixes that.

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>
